metadata.title: USN-5098-1 -- bl vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that bl didn't properly sanitize the inputs. An attacker could use this to leak sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5098-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  node-bl - 1.1.2-1ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
